food.question: I am yellow and you peel me to eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I'm a fruit that monkeys enjoy.
💛 My color is bright and sunny.
〰️ You have to take off my jacket to eat me.

food.question: I am round and red, and I grow on a tree. Sometimes I'm in your lunchbox! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree branch.
🔴 I am usually red, sometimes green.
🍎 I'm a popular fruit to eat with peanut butter.

food.question: I am long and orange and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 A furry friend likes to eat me.
🥕 I'm a veggie that can help you see in the dark.
🧡 My color is like the sun setting.

food.question: I am white and cold, and I am yummy in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I'm a frozen treat you eat with a spoon.
⚪ I can be lots of different flavors and colors.
❄️ I melt if it's too hot.

food.question: I am a grain, you can eat me with butter. Sometimes I am even in a sandwich! What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am made from wheat.
🍞 You can make toast out of me.
🥪 People put yummy fillings between two slices of me.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow in a big group with all my friends.
🥤 You can make juice out of me.
🟢 I am a sweet treat that birds love.

food.question: I am made from milk and I'm good for your bones. You can eat me on crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🧀 Mice are known to enjoy eating me!
🦴 I am a good source of calcium.

food.question: I am a juicy fruit that is orange and has a peel. People like to drink my juice for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am named after a color.
🍹 You can squeeze me to make juice.
☀️ I am a great way to start your day.

food.question: I am a small green vegetable. I look like tiny trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I look like small trees!
🥦 I am very healthy for you.
💚 I am often served with dip.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that comes in many flavors and colors. I am made with sugar and sometimes have a stick. What am I?

hints.text: 🍬 I am a sugary snack!
🍭 I sometimes come on a stick.
🌈 I can be chewy, hard or soft!

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥛 You can drink what I give you.
🌱 I eat grass in a field.
🐄 I'm a farm animal.

animal.question: I meow and love to play with string. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to chase things that dangle.
🐾 I purr when you pet me.
🐈 I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🏡 I guard your house.
🐕 I'm a loyal companion.

animal.question: I quack and waddle when I walk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds and plants.
🐣 I hatch from an egg.
🦆 I like to swim in ponds.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts, but I mostly eat plants.
🐘 I'm very big and gray.
💧 I can use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🐾 I have a fluffy tail.
🐇 I jump around in the grass.

animal.question: I roar and I'm often called the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane around my head.
🐾 I am a big cat.
🍖 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I make funny faces.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 I like to peel my food before eating it.

animal.question: I'm green and hop and say 'Ribbit!'. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I like to eat insects.
🌱 I live near ponds and lakes.
💧 I start as a tadpole and then grow legs.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.
🌾 I eat grass on the plains of Africa.
🐾 No two stripe patterns are exactly alike!
